item.description: Imagine you just woke up, took a shower and you immediately go to your coffee machine to make that strong, large, morning, double-shot, extra-spice-and-everything-nice cup of coffee.

item.title: Exception handling and testing it with Minitest
item.description: When testing our code, we usually go for the happy path (TM).
